---
title: "Chickwts analysis"
output: html_document
---
```{r,echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
options(knitr.table.format = "html")
```


**Descriptive Statistics** \
```{r }

table1 <- chickwts %>% 
  group_by(feed) %>% 
  summarise(n = n(),
           avrage = mean(weight),
           SD = sd(weight)) 
datatable(table1)

```
\ **plots** \
```{r}
chickwts %>% 
  ggplot( aes ( x=feed , y=weight) ) + geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
chickwts %>% 
  ggplot( aes ( x=feed , y=weight)) +
  geom_jitter() +
  stat_summary(fun.data = mean_sdl, # add the mean and the Std. Dev.
               fun.args = list(mult = 1),  # Add onlye 1 std. Dev.
               col = "red") 
```
\ **one way anova** \
```{r}
chick_lm <- lm( weight ~ feed , data = chickwts)

chick_lm %>% 
  anova()
```
\ **Tukeyâ€™s Post-hoc test:** \
```{r}
tuk <- TukeyHSD(aov( weight ~ feed , data = chickwts))$feed 
datatable(tuk)
```
